name: vscode-rocket-tagged-llvm
description: Build tagged RISC-V programs with LLVM, emit FSM sideband traces, and validate transitions against policy.

commands.title: Rocket Tagged: Build + Emit FSM Sideband
Rocket Tagged: Build + Check FSM Sideband
Rocket Tagged: Package SD Card Layout

rocketTagged.objcopyPath.description: Path to objcopy used to extract sideband section from object files.

rocketTagged.sidebandSection.description: ELF section name used for sideband FSM trace stream.

rocketTagged.python.description: Python executable used for the FSM checker.

rocketTagged.targetTriple.description: LLVM target triple for Rocket binaries.

rocketTagged.passPluginPath.description: Optional LLVM pass plugin (.so) loaded with -fpass-plugin=...

rocketTagged.extraClangArgs.description: Additional clang args appended to build commands.

rocketTagged.fsmPolicyPath.description: Path to FSM transition policy JSON.

rocketTagged.linkerPath.description: Path to linker command for ELF generation. Empty uses <llvmBinDir>/clang.

rocketTagged.linkArgs.description: Arguments passed to linker when producing deployment ELF.

rocketTagged.bundleOutputDir.description: Output root for generated deployment bundles.

rocketTagged.bundleCreateZip.description: Also create a .zip archive for each deployment bundle.

rocketTagged.sdLayoutOutputDir.description: Output root for generated SD card layout staging directories.

rocketTagged.sdPayloadFilename.description: Filename for payload ELF in SD card staging output.

rocketTagged.sdSidebandFilename.description: Filename for FSM sideband stream in SD card staging output.

rocketTagged.sdPolicyFilename.description: Filename for policy JSON in SD card staging output.

rocketTagged.sdManifestFilename.description: Filename for copied deployment bundle manifest in SD card staging output.

rocketTagged.sdBootScriptFilename.description: Filename for generated example boot script in SD card staging output.

rocketTagged.sdLayoutCreateZip.description: Also create a .zip archive for each SD card staging layout.

rocketTagged.payloadLoadAddress.description: Intended payload load address recorded in bundle manifest.

rocketTagged.sidebandLoadAddress.description: Intended sideband stream load address recorded in bundle manifest.
